Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Board Agendas, Minutes & Live Meetings](http://www.cityofmanvel.com/129/Board-Agendas-Minutes-Live-Meetings)

   Check out agendas from City Council and other committees active in the city.
2. #### [Boards & Commissions](http://www.cityofmanvel.com/148/Boards-Commissions)

   The City of Manvel has various boards and commissions that serve the City Council.
3. #### [Mayor & City Council Members](http://www.cityofmanvel.com/151/Mayor-City-Council-Members)

   The Manvel Council's primary duty is policymaking, which includes identifying the needs of local residents, formulating programs to meet the changing requirements of the community, and measuring the effectiveness of ongoing municipal services.
4. #### [Departments](http://www.cityofmanvel.com/156/Departments)

   See the different departments that make up the City of Manvel and find general and contact information for them.
5. #### [Public Notices](http://www.cityofmanvel.com/280/Public-Notices)
6. #### [Elections](http://www.cityofmanvel.com/159/Election-Information)
